headline: Gold Tops $5,200 as Dollar Slides; Silver Up Over 50% YTD
summary: Bullion hits record as dollar weakness, bond selloffs, and geopolitical risks drive investment demand for precious metals.

raw.headline: Gold Tops $5,200 as Dollar Slides; Silver Up Over 50% YTD
raw.summary: Bullion hits record as dollar weakness, bond selloffs, and geopolitical risks drive investment demand for precious metals.

headline: Nasdaq (NDAQ) Tops Q4 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: Nasdaq (NDAQ) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +5.19% and +1.69%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Nasdaq (NDAQ) Tops Q4 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
raw.summary: Nasdaq (NDAQ) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +5.19% and +1.69%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Gold Tops $5,500 as Record Rally Gains Pace on Debasement Trade
summary: Precious metals have risen dramatically this year on heightened geopolitical tensions and worries about the independence of the Federal Reserve, which have supported the debasement trade.  Gold’s recent surge “reflects a rare alignment of forces rather than a single catalyst,” said Christopher Hamilton, head of client solutions for Asia-Pacific ex-Japan at asset manager Invesco Ltd. “The speed with which gold is breaking milestones underscores how quickly confidence in traditional policy tools is eroding.”  Spot gold has risen by nearly 30% this year and silver by around two-thirds, in a rapid acceleration of multiyear bull runs.
